lists.title: Exam concepts
lines: Designing and deploying scalable, highly available, and fault tolerant systems on AWS
Selecting the appropriate AWS service based on data, compute, database, or security requirements
Identifying appropriate use of AWS architectural best practices
Estimating AWS costs and identifying cost control mechanisms

lists.title: Responsibilities
lines: Advicing, designing, maintaining and optimizing cloud environment of our clients
Configuring and developing automated and scalable infrastructures
Determining a short and long term strategy with our clients to reach their innovative goals
Translating business challenges from clients to technical solutions
